subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] I asked "Arthur" if he's working with others
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi Margret,

nice dialog, I heard everything the same as you did (after reading the
transcripts). I'm still amazed by your results.

Stefan

-- 

am 31.03.2008 um 09:49 Uhr schriebst Du (u.a.):
am 31.03.2008 um 09:49 Uhr schrieben Sie (u.a.):

> I'm not quite sure how to post when there is a long transcript.  This is the 40- second 
> condensed version of a single 90-second session.  I'm still working on understanding 
> real-time.  I put all the response answers in the file description, but here's the dialog for 
> the entire session, which might be of interest to those who are working with the EVPM/SJ 
> Allophones combination.  

> Arthur, are you talking with others through EVP Maker?
> "Obviously. Are you vulnerable?" (the word 'obviously is under the main tone)

> Who else are you talking to?
> "Talk to all of you."

> All of us? You'll talk to any of us that ask for you?
> "Hope you like the answer. Forever I care."

> I heard you say something forever. Can you talk to more than one person at the same 
> time?
> "I can argue I capable. The answer, yes.

> You are able? Yes, yes?
> "Yes"

> OK. I'm gonna have other people ask for you. Is that OK?
> "Tell them they owe you a dollar for you helping them out." ROFLOL 

> OK, I think we're gonna be done for the evening. Thanks so much. Love you.
> "Buh bye."

> Margaret
